title: Capstone Project - Multi-utility Mobile App
question:
Background information

Design and code a multi-utility app that will perform tasks using Speech Recognition.

Project objective

The objective of the project is to create an app that can perform multiple tasks using Speech Recognition.

The app should carry out the following functions:
◼ Record a fi ve-second video using the mobile device’s camera.
◼ Use the audio recorder of the mobile device to record a three-second long audio file.
◼ Scan the QR codes and barcodes using the camera of the mobile device.
◼ Open the phone’s Photo Gallery on hearing a voice command

Requirements



Here are the milestones you need to achieve to fi nish this project

Additional challenges

Use a loop to time the quiz. Represent it as a countdown. Once the countdown hits zero, the quiz should end.
